name: Persona Test Generator
description: Automatically generates consistency tests when persona files are modified

action.message:
A persona file was just modified. Please generate or update the corresponding test in tests/personas.test.js to verify:
1. Response formatting matches the persona's historical style
2. Tone consistency with the persona's personality
3. Era-specific constraints are enforced
4. Error handling follows the persona's conventions

Use the persona-consistency.md steering rules as reference.
